title: I have pixel one phone, I'm suffering from microphone issue. I would like to file a claim. Thanks
content:
I have pixel one phone, I'm suffering from microphone issue. I can't use the basic functionality "calling", I can't communicate, I lose a lot of time money due to, this killing issue.
I would like to file a claim.
https://lifehacker.com/pixel-owners-submit-your-settlement-claim-now-to-recei-1837211040
Thanks
